it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model

Class TableTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.TableTest

  • public class TableTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class tests the main functionalities of the Table class: it creates a Table and adds to it four players, then tries to: set the game bans, throw the dice for a round, place the cards for a round and finally reset the Table
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
